text:
WeBRAND - http://webrand.com - Los Angeles, CA

About:

WeBRAND is a platform that allows brands to collaborate with their audience to monetize their digital influence through limited edition products, risk-free.

Who we're looking for:

We're looking for a front-end developer with experience with:

  · Javascript 
  · User Experience Design 
  · jQuery 
  · HTML+CSS 
  · Github
  · Bootstrap  
  · Ruby on Rails
For more information on the company and the open position, please visit:

https://angel.co/webrand

If you're interested, you can contact michael@webrand.com
